rci.optiontype.info.flag: Type a list of flags, separated by commas, here
rci.option.info.inventorysplit:
Whether or not &6the survival inventory&r is always displayed on the right-hand side of the screen.
When turned off, the survival inventory can still be accessed by clicking its dedicated tab
rci.option.info.hotbarsplit:
Whether or not &6saved hotbars&r are always displayed on the right-hand side of the screen.
When turned off, saved inventories can still be access by clicking its dedicated tab
rci.option.info.switchhotbars: The hotkey used to &6cycle between saved hotbars
rci.option.info.nexthotbar: The hotkey used to &6switch to the &bnext saved hotbar
rci.option.info.previoushotbar: The hotkey used to &6switch to the &cprevious saved hotbar
rci.option.info.mainbackground: The &6background color&r of the creative inventory
rci.option.info.componentbackground: The &6foreground&r color of the creative inventory
rci.option.info.componentoutline: The color of the &6outlines of the individual sections&r in the creative inventory
rci.option.info.slotoutline: The color of the &6outlines of inventory slots&r, such as hotbar slots
rci.itemedit.info.flags:
The &6Custom Flags&r associated with this item
&f&oFlags are 'tags' that RCI can use to group items quickly and efficiently
